# SpunkArt — Digital Art, Tools & Products

> SpunkArt builds affordable edge computing tools, free utilities, and digital products. Also a digital art studio creating Bitcoin ordinal inscriptions. Built 120+ websites in under 7 days using AI. Follow @SpunkArt13.

## Products & Tools

### Cloudflare Workers Toolkit ($4.99 each, $19.99 all 18)
18 ready-to-deploy tools: OpenClaw Game, Auto-SSL Monitor, Spotify Widget, Link Shortener, Uptime Monitor, Bot Blocker, Redirect Manager, Image Optimizer, Email Forwarder, A/B Testing, Privacy Analytics, Cache Purger, Discord Bot, API Monitor, Log Analyzer, Edge Checkout, Form Handler, Rate Limiter.

### Free Tools (no signup required)
- [Password Generator](https://spunkart.com/password-generator)
- [PDF Tools — Merge, Split, Compress](https://spunkart.com/pdf-tools)
- [Budget Tracker](https://spunkart.com/budget-tracker)
- [Scam Checker](https://scam.ink/scam-checker)

### Ebook: "Zero to 120+ Websites in 7 Days" ($14.99)
How one solo founder built 120+ live websites in a week with AI. Includes source code, 50 AI prompts, action plan.
